channel.title: Zap that moquito and other anoying adds FOREVER!
channel.description:
Nice, simple, noob proof!
1. Download and install firefox. Download from http://www.mozilla.com/firefox/ Install following the instructions provided by the installation wizzard.
2. Run FireFox!
3. Download AdBlock from [url=http://adblock.ethereal.net/Adblock_v.5/adblock-05-dev.xpi]here[/url] (using FireFox ofcourse!) click install.
4.Restart FireFox
5.Click Tools -> Adblock -> Preferences.
6.In the "New Filter" box add [code]http://cdn.euroclick.com/contents/*[/code]
7.Click Done!
Other Ads to Add! - ofcourse you could just use the [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/1136/]updater![/url] Google ads! [code]http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/*[/code] Burstnet ads! [code]http://www.burstnet.com/cgi-bin/ads/*[/code] Falkag ads! [code]http://*.as-us.falkag.net/*[/code] Fastclick ads! [code]http://*.fastclick.net/*[/code] Euroclick ads! [code]http://*.euroclick.com/contents/*[/code] First ad solution ads! [code]http://*.firstadsolution.com/*[/code] Ectology ads! [code]http://*.etology.com/*[/code] Adtology ads! [code]http://adtology2.com/*[/code] Note: You may not be able to access the ad providers site with these filters enabled.
Testing it! If you can see the below image you do not have the "first ad solution" filter enabled! [img]http://content.firstadsolution.com/19042/127942/d756de2c94abed106718f19ddac5fba1.jpg[/img]
Omg nix you didnt give me the filter to block x add oh noes what can i do!?!?!? Just right click on the add and select "Adblock image..."
or you can download firefox + adblock + adblock updater [url=http://files.filefront.com//;5448358;;/]here[/url]

item.title: Zap that moquito and other anoying adds FOREVER!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

further explanation plz?[quote=“allserversuck, post:10, topic:10754”]wow that was a big waste of 20 mitues thanks noob[/quote]
further explanation plz? lol

from what ur saying i guess you followed the tut and it took you 20 mins to do
(lol come on this is like 5-10 mins at max!)
and that your not happy with the result
(it does exactly what it says in the title)

or you spent 20 mins trying to load this page with a crappy internet connection?

so which is it?
are you the retard who look up every word in a dictionary first or the guy runnin 5kb internet?

Read full topic
item.source: Zap that moquito and other anoying adds FOREVER!

item.title: Zap that moquito and other anoying adds FOREVER!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Once you have Ad-Block, don’t bother with manually adding new sites. Just download the Ad-Block filter! You can use the Ad-Block Filter once you have the extension Ad-Block or Ad-Block Plus installed.

https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/1136/

Read full topic

item.title: Zap that moquito and other anoying adds FOREVER!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Nice, simple, noob proof!

  1. Download and install firefox.
    Download from http://www.mozilla.com/firefox/
    Install following the instructions provided by the installation wizzard.

  2. Run FireFox!

  3. Download AdBlock from here (using FireFox ofcourse!)
    click install.

4.Restart FireFox

5.Click Tools -> Adblock -> Preferences.

6.In the “New Filter” box add http://cdn.euroclick.com/contents/*

7.Click Done!

Other Ads to Add! - ofcourse you could just use the updater!
Google ads!

http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/*

Burstnet ads!

http://www.burstnet.com/cgi-bin/ads/*

Falkag ads!

http://*.as-us.falkag.net/*

Fastclick ads!

http://*.fastclick.net/*

Euroclick ads!

http://*.euroclick.com/contents/*

First ad solution ads!

http://*.firstadsolution.com/*

Ectology ads!

http://*.etology.com/*

Adtology ads!

http://adtology2.com/*

Note: You may not be able to access the ad providers site with these filters enabled.

Testing it!
If you can see the below image you do not have the “first ad solution” filter enabled!

Omg nix you didnt give me the filter to block x add oh noes what can i do!?!?!?
Just right click on the add and select “Adblock image…”

or you can download firefox + adblock + adblock updater here
